text: Group C of the 2015 Africa Cup of Nations qualification tournament is one of the nine groups to decide the teams which qualify for the 2015 Africa Cup of Nations finals tournament. Group C consists of four teams: Gabon, Burkina Faso, Angola, and Lesotho, where they play against each other home-and-away in a round-robin format. == Standings == == Matches == \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- == Goalscorers == == Discipline == == Notes == == References == == External links == *Orange Africa Cup Of Nations Qualifiers, CAFonline.com Group C
title: 2015 Africa Cup of Nations qualification Group C
